primary.title: Kala
primary.description: A planet of several Mantles. The Origin Planet where the Mantles first created Human life.

primary.title: Constella
primary.description: A Cyberpunk haven. Thanks to the 'Abundancy points' dotted across the planet, they have unlimited and direct access to every resource within Kalpa.

primary.title: Seryph
primary.description: A Fabryka rich, caste-oriented, society. The people spend their entire youth studying and practicing for their Mage Exam.
primary.quote: Within a falsehood caste. Fate wreathed in award. You cannot be its Hunter. But you can be its Sword.

primary.title: Perpetua
primary.description: A steampunk-pirate planet. Arguably the most peaceful planet in Kalpa, home to the Orchid's and the Mantle of Logic.
primary.quote: You lack turmoil to befit privilege. You have not faced fear. The shoulders of benevolence are not eternal. And reason will not hold you dear.

secondary.title: Isotope
secondary.description: The only planet in Kalpa where life evolved naturally. A radiation-stricken landscape, a product of their greatest achievements.

secondary.title: Karmana
secondary.description: Home of the Mantle of Karma. Known for it's brutal trials that are rewarded with wishes from the Mantle himself.
